titleStmt.title: Essays on several subjects written by Sir Tho. Pope Blount.
Essays. Selections
titleStmt.author: Blount, Thomas Pope, Sir, 1649-1697.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.

That interest governs the world -- The great mischief and prejudice of learning -- On education, and custome -- Of the ancients and the respect that is due unto them -- Whether the men of this present age are any way inferiour to those of former ages -- Of passion -- The variety of opinions.
